submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumOperations(self, xx, yy):
        n = len(xx)
        x = [0] * (n + 5)
        y = [0] * (n + 5)
        
        for i in range(1, n+1):
            x[i] = xx[i-1]
            y[i] = yy[i-1]
        
        for i in reversed(range(1, n+1)):
            x[i] -= x[i-1]
            y[i] -= y[i-1]
        
        ans, s1, s2, MIN = 0, 0, 0, 99999999999
        for i in range(1, n+1):
            if x[i] >= y[i]:
                t = x[i] - y[i]
                MIN = min(s2, t)
                t -= MIN
                s1 += t
                s2 -= MIN
                ans += MIN
            else:
                t = y[i] - x[i]
                MIN = min(s1, t)
                t -= MIN
                s1 -= MIN
                s2 += t
                ans += MIN

        ans += s1 + s2
        return ans
